name: Skeleton Words10 Quiz | Word Play | 25 Questions

questions.text: HW (an American state)
GGGL (a flock of geese)
NGNR (one who repairs or services machines)
CH (a continuous dull pain)
PLC (a European flatfish)
RG (to quarrel)
MR (a member of the people living in New Zealand and the Cook Islands before the arrival of European settlers)
LLNC (a formal agreement or pact)
B (a man who is greatly concerned with his clothes and appearance)
ST (to force out of a position, to expel)
SZ (to take hold of quickly, grab)
RT (the main vessel in the arterial network which conveys oxygen-rich blood from the heart to all parts of the body except the lungs)
H (an island in central Hawaii whose chief town is Honolulu)
MM (a leader of congregational prayer in a mosque)
RMRK (to set aside or mark out for a specific purpose)
ZL (a plant cultivated for its showy pink or purple flowers)
SCTRS (a small pair of shears for pruning)
FFZ (an art gallery in Florence)
PPLS (a breed of horse, originally from USA, typically having a spotted rump)
DRRR (a euphemistic word for buttocks)
ZKL (a book of the bible)
PCR (a person who cultivates a discriminating palate for the enjoyment of good food and drink)
THR (a goatlike mammal of mountainous regions of south Asia having a shaggy coat and curved horns)
L (a river in central Africa about 700 miles long)
questions.explanation:
Uele & uele.

	It rises near the border between Zaire and Uganda. I've never heard of it either.

questions.text: RG (a canton in north Switzerland)
questions.explanation:
Aargau.

	Hope you enjoyed this challenging quiz.
